amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert "after opportunity for hearing and public input" after the word "delay" on page 3, line 18.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-919 to insert after the word "delay", add "opportunity for hearing and public input".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 227 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Pallone.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 227 (Roll no. 389).
